alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Effingham; Jasper (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 5:48AM CDT until May 07 at 6:15AM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lincoln has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Crawford County in east central Illinois... Jasper County in southeastern Illinois... Effingham County in south central Illinois... * Until 615 AM CDT. * At 548 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Beecher City to near Hutsonville, moving south at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Hutsonville around 555 AM CDT. Palestine around 600 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Flat Rock and Edgewood. This includes the following highways... Interstate 57 between mile markers 143 and 168. Interstate 70 between mile markers 79 and 104. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
